item.title: Ukraine has unbreakable pledge from West with Trump's backing - Starmer
item.description: The UK prime minister tells a meeting of 30 Western countries that Russia's Vladimir Putin cannot be trusted.

item.title: Legendary Italian designer Giorgio Armani dies
item.description: The fashion designer was the archetype of Italian style and elegance, reimagining men's and women's suits.

item.title: 'Out of control': Witnesses describe fatal Lisbon funicular crash
item.description: At least 16 people were killed and 20 more injured, some critically, Portuguese authorities say.

item.title: Jamaican PM Andrew Holness wins rare third term in office
item.description: The incumbent, who has been in office since 2016, campaigned on the strength of his economic record.

item.title: 'I don't seek attention', says Trump on Nobel Prize speculation
item.description: After previously suggesting he deserves the prize, the president tells CBS News he is more focused on saving lives.
